Customize UI Kit.title: Customize UI Kit
Customize UI Kit.description: This guide helps you to enable/disable features present in the UI Kit.

Integration with Next.js.title: Integration with Next.js
Integration with Next.js.description: Using React UI Kit, you can integrate your Next.js application with CometChat.

Overview/index.title: Overview
Overview/index.description: The CometChat React UI Kit is developed to keep developers in mind and aims to reduce development efforts significantly.

Overview/Message Structure and Hierarchy.title: Message Structure and Hierarchy
Overview/Message Structure and Hierarchy.description: The below diagram helps you better understand the various message categories and types that a CometChat message can belong to.

UI Components/index.title: UI Components
